An open source note-taking app made for: An open source note-taking app made for programmers just like you.
Boostnote collects anonymous data for th: Boostnote collects anonymous data for the sole purpose of improving the application, and strictly does not collect any personal information such the contents of your notes.
You can see how it works on: You can see how it works on
You can choose to enable or disable this: You can choose to enable or disable this option.
Enable analytics to help improve Boostno: Enable analytics to help improve Boostnote
Boostnote is used in about 200 different: Boostnote is used in about 200 different countries and regions by an awesome community of developers.
To support our growing userbase, and sat: To support our growing userbase, and satisfy community expectations,
we would like to invest more time and re: we would like to invest more time and resources in this project.
If you use Boostnote and see its potenti: If you use Boostnote and see its potential, help us out by supporting the project on OpenCollective!
Show \"Saved to Clipboard\" notification: Show "Saved to Clipboard" notification when copying
This format is for creating text documen: This format is for creating text documents. Checklists, code blocks and Latex blocks are available.
This format is for creating code snippet: This format is for creating code snippets. Multiple snippets can be grouped into a single note.
This will permanently remove this note.
Name: Name
Unlinking removes this linked storage fr: Unlinking removes this linked storage from Boostnote. No data is removed, please manually delete the folder from your hard drive if needed.
Render newlines in Markdown paragraphs a: Render newlines in Markdown paragraphs as
Convert textual arrows to beautiful sign: Convert textual arrows to beautiful signs. ⚠ This will interfere with using HTML comments in your Markdown.
⚠ You have pasted a link referring an at: ⚠ You have pasted a link referring an attachment that could not be found in the storage location of this note. Pasting links referring attachments is only supported if the source and destination location is the same storage. Please Drag&Drop the attachment instead! ⚠
Save tags of a note in alphabetical orde: Save tags of a note in alphabetical order
New notes are tagged with the filtering: New notes are tagged with the filtering tags
